caption.text:
ðŸ‘‰Contribute to the new issue of GDC User Guide!ðŸ‘ˆ I would like to invite you all to contribute something you've made with Glyphdrawing.club to the new GDC User Guide zine! It can be anything: type design, illustrations, ASCII art, poetry, patterns, typegraphic trickery, text, experiments, sketches... anything! All contributions will be included to the zine. You can submit straight from the website by filling the form at the bottom of the sidebar. 
Rules: No rules!
Deadline: 15.1.2019

The zine will be published 28th of February 2019 at @kosminenkollektiivi art space in Helsinki.

Contributors will receive a pdf of the zine sent to their email and the physical copy just for the price of postage. The zines will be sold but only to cover printing costs and/or to fund future issues.

#glyphdrawing #ascii #asciiart #unscii #textmode #typography #graphicdesign #illustration #modular #modulardesign #typesetting #postascii #asciineverdies
